title: 1950 Thriller - Man on the Run - Directed by Norman Foster - with Ann Sheridan

sources.title: 1950 Thriller - Man on the Run - Directed by Norman Foster - with Ann Sheridan
sources.description:
Frank Johnson, a sole witness to a gangland murder, goes into hiding and is trailed by Police Inspector Ferris, on the theory that Frank is trying to escape from possible retaliation. Frank's wife, Eleanor, suspects he is actually running away from their unsuccessful marriage. Aided by a newspaperman, Danny Leggett, Eleanor sets out to locate her husband. The killer is also looking for him, and keeps close tabs on Eleanor.

Original title: Woman on the Run
Alternative title: Man on the Run (working title)

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/LKY3bhGcIrA


Director: Norman Foster
Writers: Alan Campbell, Norman Foster, Sylvia Tate
Stars: Ann Sheridan, Dennis O'Keefe, Robert Keith
Genres: Crime, Drama, Film-Noir, Thriller


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics
